plugin.name: xBroadcast_Tick
plugin.author: Bast
plugin.purpose: Sends updates when the tick comes in from telopts
plugin.description:
[FOR PLUGIN AUTHORS ONLY]
Detects when a tick is sent through telopts
Example:
function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text) if id == "aaa70b4680508448e19b8b25" and msg == 1 then -- do something on tick end end

muclient.script:
require "var" require "pluginhelper" require "ldplugin" require "verify"
status = {}
function OnPluginTelnetOption (option) --- ignore not type 100.
if string.byte(option,1) ~= 101 then return end
itype = tonumber(string.byte(option,2))
phelper:broadcast(itype) phelper:mdebug(type(phelper.crontick)) phelper:mdebug(phelper.crontick) phelper:mdebug(status.statestring) if verify_bool(phelper.crontick) and (status.statestring == 'active' or status.statestring == 'sleeping' or status.statestring == 'resting') then phelper:mdebug("Sending", "cr") SendNoEcho("") end
end -- function

phelper:add_setting('crontick', {help="send a cr to mud on a tick", type="bool", default=verify_bool(false)})
phelper:set_default('cmd', 'btick') phelper:set_default('plugin_colour', 'orange')
phelper:enable()
